name: update algos
update algos table
update info_ratio
Click to see notes.
info:
This flow calculates the performance of Intraday stategies which are more complicated since there can be many trades over time.
This method uses "orders_all" table which should conain a record of all "closed" orders processed by Alpaca. 
Because Alpaca only allows the downloading of the 500 most recent orders, it is necessary to download the orders daily.
Note: if you are using more than 500 closed orders a day, you will need increase the frequency of downloads.

The method we use is to sum all of the "buy" and "sell" orders in the orders_old table for each ticker 
associated with the strategy. Note that the orders_all table includes all orders ever completed. So summing the
buys and sells will include include all transactations for that ticker. Since you may want to exclude
very old transactions from the algo reporting, there is a date filter included in the sql query in function node
"get sum buys orders". The query only includes orders made after the "created_at" date.

We will also need to record if there is a current position for that
ticker. The buy and sell orders are totalled, along with the current position (if any). 

To store the values we need a new table: "intraday_buy_sell" which is created in one of the flows.
Values are stored each time the flow runs, so it starts with a "truncate" request to get a fresh table.
Totals buys, sells, and current positions are stored in this table.
Gains/loss are calculated and stored in the profit field.

The performance of the algo is determined by summing all of the profits for each ticker in the strategy.

The percent changes are calculated from the total of the market value for each ticker.
The gains or losses are compared with the performance of the benchmark over time.

Because is is sometimes useful to look at the entire orders table, we have included the api endpoint: 
[your instance].machinetrader.io/api/download_orders_old which downloads the entire orders table as a csv file.

name: create orders_all table
Get All Orders Each Night (if more than 500 orders per day you will have to run more often)
get all 500 closed paper orders
insert into orders_all
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
if (qty === null) { qty = 0 }


let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
if (filled_qty === null) { filled_qty = 0 }

let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
if (filled_avg_price === null) { filled_avg_price = 0 }


let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]

let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
if (limit_price === null) { limit_price = 0 }

let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
if (stop_price === null ){ stop_price = 0}

let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]

let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
if (trail_percent === null) { trail_percent = 0 }

let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
if (trail_price === null) { trail_price = 0 }

let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

if ( status == 'filled'){
msg.query = "insert into orders_all (id,client_order_id,created_at,updated_at,submitted_at,filled_at,expired_at,canceled_at,failed_at,replaced_at,replaced_by,extended_hours,replaces,asset_id,symbol,asset_class,notional,qty,filled_qty,filled_avg_price,order_class,order_type,type,side,time_in_force,limit_price,stop_price,status,legs,trail_percent,trail_price,hwm,subtag,source, order_status, account) values ('" + id + "','" + client_order_id + "','" + created_at + "','" + updated_at + "','" + submitted_at + "','" + filled_at + "','" + expired_at + "','" + canceled_at + "','" + failed_at + "','" + replaced_at + "','" + replaced_by + "','" + extended_hours + "','" + replaces + "','" + asset_id + "','" + symbol + "','" + asset_class + "','" + notional + "','" + qty + "','" + filled_qty + "','" + filled_avg_price + "','" + order_class + "','" + order_type + "','" + type + "','" + side + "','" + time_in_force + "','" + limit_price + "','" + stop_price + "','" + status + "','" + legs + "','" + trail_percent + "','" + trail_price + "','" + hwm + "','" + subtag + "','" + source+ "', 'closed', 'paper');"
//node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;
}

name: get all 500 closed live orders
insert into orders_all
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
if (qty === null) { qty = 0 }


let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
if (filled_qty === null) { filled_qty = 0 }

let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
if (filled_avg_price === null) { filled_avg_price = 0 }


let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]

let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
if (limit_price === null) { limit_price = 0 }

let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
if (stop_price === null ){ stop_price = 0}

let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]

let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
if (trail_percent === null) { trail_percent = 0 }

let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
if (trail_price === null) { trail_price = 0 }

let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

msg.query = "insert into orders_all (id,client_order_id,created_at,updated_at,submitted_at,filled_at,expired_at,canceled_at,failed_at,replaced_at,replaced_by,extended_hours,replaces,asset_id,symbol,asset_class,notional,qty,filled_qty,filled_avg_price,order_class,order_type,type,side,time_in_force,limit_price,stop_price,status,legs,trail_percent,trail_price,hwm,subtag,source, order_status, account) values ('" + id + "','" + client_order_id + "','" + created_at + "','" + updated_at + "','" + submitted_at + "','" + filled_at + "','" + expired_at + "','" + canceled_at + "','" + failed_at + "','" + replaced_at + "','" + replaced_by + "','" + extended_hours + "','" + replaces + "','" + asset_id + "','" + symbol + "','" + asset_class + "','" + notional + "','" + qty + "','" + filled_qty + "','" + filled_avg_price + "','" + order_class + "','" + order_type + "','" + type + "','" + side + "','" + time_in_force + "','" + limit_price + "','" + stop_price + "','" + status + "','" + legs + "','" + trail_percent + "','" + trail_price + "','" + hwm + "','" + subtag + "','" + source+ "', 'closed', 'paper');"
//node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: do not use if live and paper account are the same
create intraday_buy_sell table
func:
let sql = "create table IF NOT EXISTS intraday_buy_sell (account VARCHAR(10), algo_name VARCHAR(100), symbol VARCHAR(10), type VARCHAR(10), buys FLOAT, sells FLOAT, current FLOAT, profit FLOAT)"
node.warn(sql)
msg.query = sql
return msg;

name: calculate profit
func:
let sql = "update intraday_buy_sell set profit = ( sells - (buys - current));"
node.warn(sql)
msg.query = sql
return msg;
